title: WIP and Inventory Data Report
summary: This document is a comprehensive spreadsheet containing multiple sheets with data related to Work In Progress (WIP), WIP Adjustments, Finished Goods, and Material Review Board (MRB). The 'WIP' sheet includes columns such as Sales Order, Date Promised, Customer, Part Description, and various financial metrics like Total Cost and Labour. The 'WIP Adjustments' sheet tracks WIP transactions with fields like Account Number and Month-End Date. The 'Finished Goods' sheet lists warehouse inventory details, including Part Number, Description, Qty, and Total Cost. The 'MRB' sheet provides part numbers, account names, and monthly balances, along with a year-to-date balance and variance analysis.
source_file: LT US - R401 - Inventory & Aged WIP USD.xlsx
